column1: '''The Hobbitons''' was the name given to members of [[Unquendor
column2: Unquendor, the Dutch Tolkien Society]] who released the CD ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s Songs from Middle-earth'' in [[1996]]. The CD contains 16 tracks of songs and poems from ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'', and ''[[Bilbo's Last Song]]''. ''J.R.R. Tolkien's Songs from Middle-earth'' was produced with permission of the [[Tolkien Estate]] on the condition that it would not be sold commercially.<ref name="ourCD">{{webcite
